src.Map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Map.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all details about the map, including what tile is in each position and randomises the tile placement each time a new map gets generated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map()
      Setup a new random map.

                    Camera c)
        Draw the tiles of the map onto the screen
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object where the map should be drawn onto
        c - The Camera object to use to determine where on the screen each tile is
